conversation-text:
Tsubaki: [attacking various students] Sousuke? Sousuke? Sousuke? Sousuke?!
Sousuke: Wear your glasses first, Tsubaki.
Tsubaki: Shut up. Why didn't you answer my challenge?
Sousuke: What are you talking about?
Tsubaki: Don't act like you don't know? I put a challenge letter in your shoe box!
Chidoi: So it was a challenge letter?
Sousuke: I just knew about it just now.
Tsubaki: You didn't read it?
Sousuke: I COULDN'T read it.
Sousuke: Because I blew it up.
Tsubaki: You blew it up? How dare you! I'll kill you!
